```{r}
#| label: basetabfunc
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

basetabfunc <- function(x, data, stratavar, catdig, contdig) {
  pmis <- data %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!sym(stratavar))) %>%
    mutate(mis = factor(if_else(is.na(!!sym(x)), 1, 0), levels = 0:1)) %>%
    count(mis, .drop = F) %>%
    mutate(pmis = fn(n / sum(n) * 100, catdig)) %>%
    filter(mis == "1") %>%
    pull(pmis)

  tmp <- data %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!sym(x)) & !is.na(!!sym(stratavar)) & !!sym(x) != "No/missing medication")

  if (str_detect(x, "_tg")) {
    tmp <- tmp %>%
      mutate(!!sym(x) := droplevels(!!sym(x)))
  }

  cl <- class(data %>% pull(!!sym(x)))
  if (cl %in% c("character", "factor")) {
    out <- tmp %>%
      group_by(!!sym(stratavar), .drop = F) %>%
      count(!!sym(x), .drop = F) %>%
      mutate(
        out = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, catdig), ")"),
        out = case_when(
          n == 0 ~ "-",
          n < 10 ~ "<10",
          TRUE ~ out
        ),
        level = !!sym(x)
      ) %>%
      ungroup() %>%
      select(!!sym(stratavar), out, level) %>%
      pivot_wider(names_from = !!sym(stratavar), values_from = out)

    outa <- tmp %>%
      count(!!sym(x), .drop = F) %>%
      mutate(
        Overall = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / sum(n) * 100, catdig), ")"),
        Overall = case_when(
          n == 0 ~ "-",
          n < 10 ~ "<10",
          TRUE ~ Overall
        ),
        level = !!sym(x)
      ) %>%
      select(Overall, level)

    out <- full_join(outa, out, by = "level")

    # p-value
    check <- tmp %>%
      count(!!sym(stratavar), !!sym(x))
    if (nrow(check) >= 4) {
      p <- fn(chisq.test(tmp %>% pull(!!sym(stratavar)), tmp %>% pull(!!sym(x)))$p.value, p = T, dig = 3)
    } else {
      p <- "-"
    }

    # if levels No, Yes only present Yes
    levs <- out %>% pull(level)
    nlevs <- length(levs)
    if (nlevs == 2 & all(levs %in% c("No", "Yes"))) {
      out <- out %>%
        filter(level == "Yes") %>%
        mutate(
          var = x,
          p = p,
          pmis = pmis,
          level = NA
        )
    } else {
      out <- out %>%
        mutate(
          var = NA,
          p = NA,
          pmis = NA
        )
      out <- out %>% add_row(
        var = x,
        p = p,
        pmis = pmis,
        .before = 1
      )
    }
  } else if (cl %in% c("numeric", "integer")) {
    if (length(contdig) > 1) {
      if (any(contdig$vars %in% x)) {
        contdig <- contdig %>%
          filter(vars == x) %>%
          pull(contdig)
      } else {
        contdig <- 0
      }
    }
    out <- tmp %>%
      group_by(!!sym(stratavar), .drop = F) %>%
      reframe(
        med = quantile(!!sym(x), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.5)),
        q1 = quantile(!!sym(x), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.25)),
        q3 = quantile(!!sym(x), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.75)),
        n = n()
      ) %>%
      mutate(
        out = paste0(fn(med, contdig), " [", fn(q1, contdig), "-", fn(q3, contdig), "]"),
        out = case_when(
          n == 0 ~ "-",
          n < 10 ~ "<10",
          TRUE ~ out
        )
      ) %>%
      ungroup() %>%
      select(!!sym(stratavar), out) %>%
      pivot_wider(names_from = !!sym(stratavar), values_from = out)

    outa <- tmp %>%
      summarise(
        med = quantile(!!sym(x), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.5)),
        q1 = quantile(!!sym(x), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.25)),
        q3 = quantile(!!sym(x), na.rm = T, probs = c(0.75)),
        n = n()
      ) %>%
      mutate(
        Overall = paste0(fn(med, contdig), " [", fn(q1, contdig), "-", fn(q3, contdig), "]"),
        Overall = case_when(
          n == 0 ~ "-",
          n < 10 ~ "<10",
          TRUE ~ Overall
        )
      ) %>%
      select(Overall)

    out <- bind_cols(outa, out)

    # p-value
    check <- tmp %>%
      count(!!sym(stratavar), !is.na(!!sym(x)))
    if (nrow(check) >= 2) {
      p <- fn(kruskal.test(formula(paste0(x, " ~ ", stratavar)), data = tmp)$p.value, p = T, dig = 3)
    } else {
      p <- "-"
    }

    out <- out %>%
      mutate(
        var = x,
        p = p,
        pmis = pmis
      )
  } else {
    stop("Unknown class in baseline table")
  }
}
```

```{r}
#| label: tbl-base
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false
#| dependson: basetabfunc
#| tbl-cap: "Baseline characteristics"
#| tbl-pos: "H"

contdig <- tibble(vars = c("shf_potassium"), contdig = 1)
catdig <- 0

tab <- rsdata %>%
  count(advhftreat, .drop = F) %>%
  mutate(
    Overall = sum(n),
    n = paste0(n, " (", fn(n / Overall * 100, catdig), ")"),
    Overall = paste0(Overall)
  ) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = advhftreat, values_from = n) %>%
  mutate(
    var = "N (%)",
    level = NA,
    p = NA,
    pmis = NA
  ) %>%
  select(var, level, pmis, Overall, levels(rsdata %>% pull(advhftreat)), p)

tabtmp <- sapply(tabvars,
  FUN = basetabfunc, data = rsdata,
  stratavar = "advhftreat", catdig = catdig, contdig = contdig
)

tabtmp <- bind_rows(tabtmp)
tab <- bind_rows(tab, tabtmp)

tab <- tab %>%
  mutate(
    # if recoding or categorizing will still get org label
    var_tmp = str_replace_all(var, "(_cat2|_cat)", ""),
    # if shf/sos combination  will still get org label
    var_tmp = str_replace_all(var_tmp, "shf_sos_com_", "sos_com_")
  )

tab <- left_join(tab,
  metavars %>%
    select(variable, label, unit),
  by = c("var_tmp" = "variable")
) %>%
  mutate(
    Variable = coalesce(label, var_tmp),
    Variable = if_else(!is.na(unit),
      paste0(Variable, " (", unit, ")"),
      Variable
    ),
    Variable = if_else(!is.na(level) & !is.na(Variable),
      paste0(Variable, " ", level),
      coalesce(Variable, paste0("  ", level))
    ),
    # small fixes
    Variable = str_replace_all(Variable, fixed("Disposable income (100 SEK)"), "Income")
  )

# footnotes
tab <- tab %>%
  mutate(
    footnote1 = if_else(!is.na(var) & str_detect(var, "_tg"), footnote_marker_alphabet(1, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote2 = if_else(!is.na(var) & var %in% c("shf_rasiarni_tg"), footnote_marker_alphabet(2, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote3 = if_else(!is.na(var) & var %in% c("shf_mra_tg"), footnote_marker_alphabet(3, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote4 = if_else(!is.na(var) & var %in% c("shf_sglt2"), footnote_marker_alphabet(4, format = "latex"), ""),
    footnote5 = if_else(!is.na(var) & var %in% c("shf_potassium_cat", "shf_potassium"), footnote_marker_alphabet(5, format = "latex"), "")
  ) %>%
  unite(footnote, starts_with("footnote"), sep = "")

cn <- c("Variable", "Missing (%)", "Overall", levels(rsdata %>% pull(advhftreat)), "p-value")
cn <- str_remove(cn, "Yes ")

footnotetext <- c(
  "% missing is for patients with the respective medication.",
  "If a patient has multiple ACEi/ARB/ARNi the highest target dose is selected.",
  "Included in the CRF October 2013.",
  "Included in the CRF April 2021.",
  "Included in the CRF 2006."
)

# excel
tab_xls <- tab %>%
  mutate(
    Variable = paste0(Variable, footnote),
    Variable = str_remove_all(Variable, "textsuperscript|\\}|\\{"),
    Variable = str_replace_all(Variable, "\\\\", " ")
  ) %>%
  select(Variable, pmis:p) %>%
  add_row(Variable = "") %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("a ", footnotetext[1])) %>%
  add_row(Variable = paste0("b ", footnotetext[2]))

make_one_xlsxsheet(tab_xls, colnames = cn)

# footnotes
tab <- tab %>%
  mutate(
    # so no probs
    Variable = sanitize_text(Variable),
    Variable = paste0(Variable, footnote),
    Variable = str_replace_all(Variable, fixed("Â²"), "\\textsuperscript{2}"),
    Variable = str_replace_all(Variable, fixed("$>$="), "$\\geq$"),

  ) %>%

indent_rows <- tab %>%

  ) %>%
  filter(indent_rows) %>%

cn <- sanitize_text(cn)

default_kable(tab,
```
